text: The Cucujiformia is an infraorder of polyphagan beetles. It includes most plant-eating beetles. It has six superfamilies: * Chrysomeloidea ~7 families including longhorn beetles & leaf beetles * Cleroidea checkered beetles, bark- gnawing beetles and Melyridae, the soft-winged flower beetles * Cucujoidea 32 families including ladybirds and fungus beetles * Curculionoidea ~8 families mostly weevils; also snout beetles and bark beetles * Lymexylidae (ship-timber beetles) * Tenebrionoidea (formerly "Heteromera") 30 families including blister beetles and ant-like beetles Category:Polyphaga
title: Cucujiformia
